price: Disse: "Sabeis o que fizestes com José e seu irmão, quando éreis ignorantes?"
arabic: قَالَ هَلۡ عَلِمۡتُم مَّا فَعَلۡتُم بِيُوسُفَ وَأَخِيهِ إِذۡ أَنتُمۡ جَٰهِلُونَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: qāla hal ʿalim'tum mā faʿaltum biyūsufa wa-akhīhi idh antum jāhilūna
